content.raw:
I don't have permission to push to your fork, so here's the diff of the fix that @scpeters helped me make to compile it:

```
diff -r 4976671759eb CMakeLists.txt
--- a/CMakeLists.txt	Tue Apr 28 14:24:39 2015 -0700
+++ b/CMakeLists.txt	Thu Apr 30 10:56:25 2015 -0700
@@ -155,7 +155,10 @@
 # uppercase old supported and deprecated modes
 string(TOUPPER ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE_UPPERCASE)
 
-set (HDF5_INSTRUMENT FALSE)
+if (NOT DEFINED HDF5_INSTRUMENT)
+  set (HDF5_INSTRUMENT FALSE)
+endif()
+
 set (BUILD_TYPE_PROFILE FALSE)
 set (BUILD_TYPE_RELEASE FALSE)
 set (BUILD_TYPE_RELWITHDEBINFO FALSE)
```

You can save this in a file and use `hg import <filename>` to apply it!
content.html:
I don't have permission to push to your fork, so here's the diff of the fix that @scpeters helped me make to compile it:

diff -r 4976671759eb CMakeLists.txt
--- a/CMakeLists.txt    Tue Apr 28 14:24:39 2015 -0700
+++ b/CMakeLists.txt    Thu Apr 30 10:56:25 2015 -0700
@@ -155,7 +155,10 @@
 # uppercase old supported and deprecated modes
 string(TOUPPER ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE_UPPERCASE)

-set (HDF5_INSTRUMENT FALSE)
+if (NOT DEFINED HDF5_INSTRUMENT)
+  set (HDF5_INSTRUMENT FALSE)
+endif()
+
 set (BUILD_TYPE_PROFILE FALSE)
 set (BUILD_TYPE_RELEASE FALSE)
 set (BUILD_TYPE_RELWITHDEBINFO FALSE)

You can save this in a file and use hg import <filename> to apply it!
